amendment.description: Amendment provides for funding within the General Operating Expenses account of the Veterans Benefits Administration for veterans employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that $5 million be designated for job training for Veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gallego.
